description: A package that allows continuum (2D) images and spectral (3D) images to be mosaicked together, using montage commands.

parameters.info: State 'continuum' or 'spectral' as the type of mosaic to be made.
parameters.name: mosaic_type

parameters.info: Include this argument if you wish to use montage for regridding the images and beams (if they have not already been created).
parameters.name: domontage

parameters.info: The cutoff in the primary beam to use (assuming a Gaussian at the moment). E.g. The default of 0.1 means going down to the 10 percent level for each pointing.
parameters.name: cutoff

parameters.info: The prefix to be used for output files.
parameters.name: outname

parameters.info: The filenames of each target/pointing image to be mosaicked. A suffix of 'image.fits' is expected.
parameters.name: target_images
